description.lang: The URC Z-Wave Gateway expands Total Control and MX HomePro system control for Z-Wave based products such as lighting,thermostats, door locks, motorized shades and security devices. It connects to the LAN (Local Area Network) via Wi-Fi or wired Ethernet. It incorporates WPS (Wi-Fi Protected Set-Up) for fast, secure programming. Web-based dealer and end user portals make it easy to set up accounts, integrate products and create Z-Wave scenes. The TRF-ZW2 features remote user device management which enables off-site control, SMS/email notifications, door lock history and automation/scene creation. It features one RJ-45 Ethernet port and one USB port, plus a 12V external power supply. Professional programming required. Learn more at www.universalremote.com.
